release.new: Updating for Android 15. Yearly release needed to keep my developer account open.
Updating for Android 14. Needed to release an app update or Google was going to close my developer account.
Additional tracking options available. Add or edit an item to check out the changes!
You now need to long-press on a row to start/stop tracking.
release.bugfix: Rows can no longer be tapped when the swipe menu is open.
Focus mode continues working if left in the background for a while.

release.new: Added focus mode, when you are planning on tracking a lot of one thing.
You can now "track average" from the swipe menu.
First release! Track your APs like a pro!
